2-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
High turn rate
All targets: 1 turn Blind、 HP Attack Disable

completeListOfAbilities.name: Havoc Wing

Fair chance of inflicting Break
3-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack
Deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets

Target: 6 turns Sneering Clown
Extends own buffs 2 turns
High turn rate
BRV Attack、 Meteor become Meteor+ after use

passives.name: Trine Extension
passives.desc:
When using Trine:
 • Becomes group attack; deals proportionate HP damage to each target
 • Adds 2-hit group magic BRV attack after multiplying BRV
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Higher turn rate

passives.name: Buffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Light of Judgment Extension
passives.desc:
Light of Judgment use +1

When using Light of Judgment:
 • Moderate BRV damage boost
 • Becomes group attack; deals proportionate HP damage to each target
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Higher turn rate
 • Inflicted debuff duration +1
 • Self: 6 turns ATK Up II
passives.short_desc: Light of Judgment Extension: Boost to Light of Judgment

passive.name: Multi-Debuff Damage Up Growth
passive.desc: Multi-Debuff Damage Up use +1\n\nMulti-Debuff Damage Up effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: Multi-Debuff Damage Up Growth: Boost to Multi-Debuff Damage Up

passive.name: Magitek Power
passive.desc:
When using Trine:
 • Increased BRV multiplier
 • Blind、 HP Attack Disable duration+

After using Trine:
 • BRV Attack becomes Meteor (returns to BRV Attack after use)

passive.name: Fallen Angel's Judgment
passive.desc:
Light of Judgment use +1
Light of Judgment BRV boost
ATK Down、 DEF Down、 SPD Down boost、 duration+
After use、 BRV Attack becomes Meteor
(Returns to BRV Attack after using Meteor)
passive.short_desc: Fallen Angel's Judgment: Boost to Light of Judgment
